direct_sum_lof_tmul_lof:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `tensor_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/

@[simp]
theorem direct_sum_lof_tmul_lof (i₁ : ι₁) (m₁ : M₁ i₁) (i₂ : ι₂) (m₂ : M₂ i₂) :
    direct_sum R ι₁ ι₂ M₁ M₂ («expr ⊗ₜ » (direct_sum.lof R ι₁ M₁ i₁ m₁) (direct_sum.lof R ι₂ M₂ i₂ m₂)) =
      direct_sum.lof R (ι₁ × ι₂) (fun i => tensor_product (M₁ i.1) R (M₂ i.2)) (i₁, i₂) («expr ⊗ₜ » m₁ m₂) :=
  by simp [direct_sum]
#align direct_sum_lof_tmul_lof direct_sum_lof_tmul_lof
